Key Match Events: Lonzo Ball threw down a dunk against the New York Knicks.
Josh Giddey threw the alley-oop pass to Lonzo Ball who finished it off with a dunk on the other end.
Post-Match Reflections: The Chicago Bulls handed the New York Knicks their 12th loss of the season with a 139-126 win at the United Center.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Coby White and Zach LaVine finished the night with 33 points each.
Nikola Vucevic and Josh Giddey added double-doubles as well.
LiAngelo's song 'Tweaker' has been going viral on social media across the NBA.
Others: The Bulls now welcome the San Antonio Spurs to town on Monday for a chance at the season series sweep.
